BurstPoison.name: Deathrite【Venom】
BurstPoison.desc:
Base Stack: 5
- Deathrite
- When getting Rupture triggered by a Critical Hit from the target, lose 1 Stack
- When losing Stacks due to this effect, gain 1 Offense Level Down or 1 Defense Level Down (3 times per turn)
- When losing Stacks due to this effect, if the Stack drops to 0, take Gluttony damage equal to Rupture Potency on self
- ※ Cannot gain additional Stacks of this effect while it is already active

SnakeStance.name: Serpent Arm
SnakeStance.desc:
Max Stack: 3
Turn End: gain 3 Poise and +2 Poise Count next turn
On Base Attack Skill use, if target has Rupture, gain 5 Poise
Turn End: lose 1 Stack

EntangledCurseTalisman.name: Twisted Curse Talisman
EntangledCurseTalisman.desc:
- Max Stack: 10
- Expires at Turn End
- At 10+ Stack, when taking 30+ damage from a Skill: gain +1 Rupture Count; take Gluttony damage equal to Rupture Potency on self (once per turn)
- When this effect expires, gain (Stack / 4) Attack Power Down next turn (max 2)
※ Cannot gain additional Stacks of this effect while it is already active

CentipedePoison.name: Centipede Venom
CentipedePoison.desc:
- Max Stack: 20
- Turn End: gain (Stack / 4) Defense Level Down next turn (rounded down)
- Turn End: take Gluttony damage equal to Stack, and halve the Stack (rounded down)
Upon death, transfers to this unit's ally(for Focused Encounters, a different Part) with none or the least Centipede Venom Stacks.

BurstZilu.name: Deathrite 【Fissure】
BurstZilu.desc:
- Base Stack: 3
- When getting Rupture triggered while this unit has Deathrite, lose 1 Stack, and gain 1 Bind next turn
· When this effect activates, if this unit is to gain 3 or more Bind next turn, lose 2 Stacks instead of gaining Bind
- At 0 Stack, take Gluttony damage equal to Rupture Potency on self
※ Cannot gain additional Stacks of this effect while it is already active.

SupportProtect.name: Assist Defense
SupportProtect.desc:
- Max Stack: 3
- When an ally is about to take an Unopposed Attack from an enemy, consume 1 Stack to redirect the enemy's targeting to self; then, use the unique Skill that activates for Assist Defense
- When there are multiple allies with Assist Defense Stacks, the ally with the highest Stack has the highest activation priority
- Does not activate for allies who equipped Defense Skills
- Expires at Turn End

EnhanceZilu.name: Tianjiu Star's Blade
EnhanceZilu.desc:
- Max Stack: 20
- At 10+ Stack: at Turn End, gain 1 Haste next turn
- Used for certain Skills

BurstVulnerableZilu.name: Mark of Decay
BurstVulnerableZilu.desc:
- Max Stack: 1
- Take +10% damage from Gluttony Skills
- Take +10% damage from Deathrite
- Removed at Turn End

DragonLance.name: Flower-burying Wedge [埋花櫼]
DragonLance.desc:
Base Stack: 0
Max Stack: 3
- All Coins on this unit's leftmost Base Attack Skill on the Dashboard become Unbreakable Coins
- Turn Start: gain 2 Offense Level Up and 2 Defense Level Down for every Stack
- Turn Start: at 3+ Stack, gain 1 Tarnished Blood (once per Encounter)
- Turn End: gain 1 Stack
※ Cannot raise the effect's Stack by any other means than the ones above
- Expires upon death or Retreat

- When this unit takes damage that brings their HP down to 0: instead of letting this unit's HP drop below 1, or becoming Staggered or Defeated, use the 'Tears of the Tarnished Blood - The End' Skill at the very end of that turn. Remove the Flower-burying Wedge when the Skill ends.
When this unit takes damage that brings their HP down to 1 at Turn End, use 'Tears of the Tarnished Blood - The End' Skill based on this unit's Speed next turn

CondensedBlood.name: Tarnished Blood
CondensedBlood.desc:
Max Stack: 5
- Turn End: take 20% HP damage per Stack (cannot be Staggered by this effect)
- Gain 1 Stack at Turn End
- Expires upon death or Retreat

YesdragonSelf.name: Flower-burying Pin [埋花針]
YesdragonSelf.desc:
Max Stack: 20
- Gain 1 Stack at Turn End or when hit
- Gain 1 Offense Level per 5 Stack
- If the unit with this effect dies, inflict Gluttony damage equal to Stack and inflict 5 Rupture
- Expires upon death or Retreat

YesdragonNodie.name: Denial [不許]
YesdragonNodie.desc:
When this unit takes damage that brings their HP down to 0: this unit's HP does not drop below 1; recover from Stagger due to damage.
If the above effect activated, dies at Turn End.
Expires upon death, Retreat, or Turn End

YisangParryGubo.name: Responsibility
YisangParryGubo.desc: In Clashes against Gubo, Clash Power +2

HongluParryGahwan.name: The Will to Confront
HongluParryGahwan.desc: In Clashes against Jia Huan, Clash Power +2

DarkHongluParryGahwan.name: You're Ridiculous, Big Brother.
DarkHongluParryGahwan.desc: In Clashes against Jia Huan, Clash Power +2

NailPersonality.name: Nails
NailPersonality.desc:
Unique Bleed
Turn Start: Gain 1 Bleed and increase the Bleed Count by this effect’s Count.
Turn End: Halve the Count. (Rounded down)

AssemblePersonality.name: Fanatic
AssemblePersonality.desc: Raise Skill Final Power by the effect’s Count against units with Nails for the turn. (Applies to clashes as well)

MarkOfHeresy.name: Gaze
MarkOfHeresy.desc:
Take +20% damage from Pierce and Blunt skills for one turn.
The ally that defeats the marked unit heals 10 SP; if the ally is an 'N Corp. Fanatic', also apply 1 Fanatic next turn.
MarkOfHeresy.imageOverride: Gaze of the One Who Grips

Thirst.name: Appetite
Thirst.desc:
Increases the healing provided by the Passive [Rustle Up].
Spent when the Passive activates.

KCorpSerum.name: K Corp Ampule
KCorpSerum.desc:
Turn Start: At less than 4 Count, heal by (Count * 5)% of Max HP
At 4+ Count, the unit dies

Talisman.name: Talisman
Talisman.desc:
Max Stack: 6
On Hit, consume 1 Rupture Count on target to inflict (Stack / 2) Rupture (inflicts at least 1 Rupture if Rupture Count was consumed; rounded down)
When hit, gain (Stack / 2) Rupture and lose 1 Stack (gain at least 1 Rupture; rounded down)
Turn End: at 6+ Stack, remove all Talisman on self and take fixed damage by Stack

DuelDeclaration_DonQuixote.name: Declared Duel - Don Quixote
DuelDeclaration_DonQuixote.desc:
- In a Clash between the unit that inflicted Declared Duel and the unit with the status, the declarer has +1 Clash Power. On Hit, the declarer gains 1 Haste next turn. (4 times per turn)
- Expires when the unit inflicts Declared Duel on a different target. Replaced when other unit inflicts Declared Duel on the same target.

DuelDeclaration_Outis.name: Declared Duel - Outis
DuelDeclaration_Outis.desc:
- In a Clash between the unit that inflicted Declared Duel and the unit with the status, the declarer has +1 Clash Power. On Hit, the declarer gains 1 Haste next turn. (4 times per turn)
- Expires when the unit inflicts Declared Duel on a different target. Replaced when other unit inflicts Declared Duel on the same target.

DuelDeclaration_Sinclair.name: Declared Duel - Sinclair
DuelDeclaration_Sinclair.desc:
- In a Clash between the unit that inflicted Declared Duel and the unit with the status, the declarer has +1 Clash Power. On Hit, the declarer gains 1 Haste next turn. (4 times per turn)
- Expires when the unit inflicts Declared Duel on a different target. Replaced when another unit inflicts Declared Duel on the same target.

Muckworm.name: Maggots
Muckworm.desc: Turn End: Take Gluttony damage by the Count, then lower it by 1; Bleed Count +1.

PinkRibbon_Ishmael.name: Pink Ribbons
PinkRibbon_Ishmael.desc:
Count increases by 1 whenever the affected unit tosses an attack skill Coin.
At the end of the turn, inflict Bind by the effect’s Count, then remove the effect.

Unjust_Enrichment.name: Unjust Enrichment
Unjust_Enrichment.desc:
- Gained on Heads Hit against target with Bleed (Max 4)
- When 'Bullets are Pricey' Passive activates, consume all Unjust Enrichment stack to deal bonus damage

Resentment.name: Resentment
Resentment.desc:
If the enemy with the Vengeance Mark is hit by an attack, this effect expires at Attack End.
Expires at the end of the turn

RetaliationBook.name: Vengeance Mark
RetaliationBook.desc: Applied to the unit that dealt the most damage to an ally (Max 1)

FreischutzShotCount.name: Magic Bullet
FreischutzShotCount.desc:
- Max: 7
- Value changes depending on certain Skill effects.
- [Lobotomy E.G.O::Magic Bullet Outis Only]
· The higher the value, the higher the Base Power and Coin Power of Skill 3

DarkFlame.name: Dark Flame
DarkFlame.desc:
- Unique Burn
- Max Value: 7
- Target loses Defense Level equal to the value of this effect
- Turn End: Deal (Value x Burn on target) Pride Affinity damage, then expires

ForwardToTheKing.name: Before the King
ForwardToTheKing.desc: When this unit's attack with 1 Atk Weight hits, inflict 50% of the resulting Coin value On Hit as (Affinity/Attack Type of the Attack Skill used to hit) damage against 2 other attackable enemies with the least HP.

ForwardToTheBoundKing.name: Before the King in Binds
ForwardToTheBoundKing.desc: When this unit's attack with 1 Atk Weight hits, inflict 100% of the resulting Coin value On Hit as (Affinity/Attack Type of the Attack Skill used to hit) damage against 2 other attackable enemies with the least HP

MarkOfButler.name: B.M.
MarkOfButler.desc:
Enhances Edgar Family Chief Butler Ryōshū Skills against targets with this effect.
Turn End: reduce the Count by 1

UnstableFeeling.name: Volatile Passion
UnstableFeeling.desc:
- On Hit, inflict 1 Burn
- If the main target has Burn, Final Power +1
- When hit, if this unit had a Defense Skill chained at Combat Start, inflict Burn against the attacker for the turn
- Turn End: lose (# of turns spent in Volatile E.G.O state x 5) SP. (Max SP loss : 40)

ShieldManagerCryingToad.name: Blubberbubble
ShieldManagerCryingToad.desc:
- This effect counts as a 'Shield Management' effect.
- Turn End: Reduce Count by 1
- This unit does not lose Shield at Turn End as long as it has the Blubberbubble effect (unless depleted by damage or effect)
- If the Shield affected by Blubberbubble breaks due to taking damage, inflict 4 Sinking Potency/Count against the attacker. (How much of that '4' value is Potency or Count is randomly determined)
- This unit can stack their Shield value by using this effect. However, as long as Blubberbubble is in effect, the Shield value cannot exceed 60% of this unit's Max HP.

GazePersonality.name: Gaze of Contempt
GazePersonality.desc:
- Max Value: 7
- Deal +7% damage for every Gaze of Contempt
- Turn End: this effect expires
- Turn End: At 7 Gaze of Contempt value, convert it to Contempt of the Gaze next turn instead of expiring

[Contempt of the Gaze]
- Gain 7 Protection
- Gain 7 Damage Down
- One of this unit's Slots gains +20 Aggro
- Cannot gain Gaze of Contempt as long as Contempt of the Gaze is active
- Turn End: this effect expires

ContemptPersonality.name: Contempt of the Gaze
ContemptPersonality.desc:
- Gain 7 Protection
- Gain 7 Damage Down
- One of this unit's Skill Slots gains +20 Aggro
- Cannot gain Gaze of Contempt as long as Contempt of the Gaze is active
- Turn End: this effect expires

KnowledgeTraining.name: Erudition
KnowledgeTraining.desc:
- Max Value: 6
- When Discarding a Skill, gain (Erudition x 1.5)% of this unit's max HP as Shield (once per turn)
- If this unit Discards a Skill at 2+ Insight, gain 1 Clash Power (once per turn)
- Reduced by 1 when taking HP damage after getting hit by an enemy's Attack Skill
- Expires when Staggered

ChargeLoad.name: Load
ChargeLoad.desc:
- Max Value : 6
- Attack Skills that consumed Charge Count deal +2.5% damage for every value on self (max 15%)
- If the affected unit is a W Corp. employee., deal +5% damage for every value instead (max 30%)
- Turn End: this effect expires

BoseProjektil.name: Torn Memory
BoseProjektil.desc:
- Max Value : 7
- Used for certain Skills

PhotoElectricity.name: Photoelectricity
PhotoElectricity.desc:
Max Value: 3
When this unit is hit, the Attacker gains Charge Count equal to the value (once per Skill)
- If the Attacker has 5- Charge Count, they gain +3 additional Charge Count
Turn End: this effect expires

Coffin.name: Coffin
Coffin.desc:
- Max Value: 10
- At Turn End:
  - Gain 2 Damage Up next turn for every 3 Value (max 6)
  - Raise minimum Speed by 1 next turn for every 4 Value (max 2)
  - Gain 1 Clash Power Up next turn for every 5 Value (max 2)

WildHunt.name: Wild Hunt
WildHunt.desc:
- In the same turn this unit gained Wild Hunt for the first time, always have 1 remaining HP; "revive"(heal 50% HP and reset SP to 0) this unit at Turn End.
- On death, gain 1 E.G.O resource for the least-owned E.G.O resource
- If this unit is killed by an attack, inflict 3 Sinking against the last attacker
- Dies at the end of the same turn this unit was revived in

NightPathfinding.name: Dullahan
NightPathfinding.desc:
- Max Value: 3
- Gain 3 Offense Level
- Lose 3 Defense Level
- Raise Min & Max Speed values by 1
- Turn End: Gain 1 Dullahan next turn (At -25 SP or less, however, completely lose Dullahan)
- Turn End: If this unit has Dullahan, lose (15 - (Coffin/2)) SP. (min 10)

SinkingWhite.name: Butterfly
SinkingWhite.desc:
- Unique Sinking
- Base Value: 0, Max Value: 15
- The Potency and the Count of this effect are called "The Living" and "The Departed", respectively.
- When hit, the attacker heals (The Living/4) SP. (min 1; rounded down)
- When hit, and if this unit's SP is at less than 0, take (Sinking Potency/5) Gloom damage for every value of The Departed. (max Gloom damage 30; rounded down; deals half damage to targets without SP.)
- Turn End: Reset The Departed of this effect to 0; then, gain Sinking equal to The Living and convert The Living into The Departed.
- No external effects can raise the amount of Butterfly inflicted. "Inflict additional Sinking" effects inflict additional Sinking instead of additional Butterfly.
- This effect expires when both The Living and The Departed reach 0.

RedEyeFirst.name: Red Eyes
RedEyeFirst.desc:
- Base Skill Coin effects inflict +1 more Bleed
- Max Value : 20
- Unique Charge (fixed Potency)
- Resource used by certain Skills for additional effects
- Enhances the buff based on Value
· Stage 1 (1~7) : Red Eyes
· Stage 2 (8~15) : Red Eyes - Alert
· Stage 3 (16~20) : Red Eyes - Devouring
- The amount of additional bleed inflicted by the first line of this buff is equal to the buff enhancement Stage (max 3)

RedEyeSecond.name: Red Eyes - Alert
RedEyeSecond.desc:
- Base Skill Coin effects inflict +2 more Bleed
- Max Value : 20
- Unique Charge (fixed Potency)
- Resource used by certain Skills for additional effects
- Enhances the buff based on Value
· Stage 1 (1~7) : Red Eyes
· Stage 2 (8~15) : Red Eyes - Alert
· Stage 3 (16~20) : Red Eyes - Devouring
- The amount of additional bleed inflicted by the first line of this buff is equal to the buff enhancement Stage (max 3)

RedEyeThird.name: Red Eyes - Devouring
RedEyeThird.desc:
- Base Skill Coin effects inflict +3 more Bleed
- Max Value : 20
- Unique Charge (fixed Potency)
- Resource used by certain Skills for additional effects
- Enhances the buff based on Value
· Stage 1 (1~7) : Red Eyes
· Stage 2 (8~15) : Red Eyes - Alert
· Stage 3 (16~20) : Red Eyes - Devouring
- The amount of additional bleed inflicted by the first line of this buff is equal to the buff enhancement Stage (max 3)

PenanceFirst.name: Penitence
PenanceFirst.desc:
- Heal 2 SP On Hit with Base Skill Coins that gain Penitence
- Max Value : 20
- Unique Charge (fixed Potency)
- Turn Start: gain (Penitence)% of max HP as Shield
- Resource used by certain Skills for additional effects
- Enhances the buff Stage based on Value
· Stage 1 (1~7) : Penitence
· Stage 2 (8~15) : Penitence - Periphery
· Stage 3 (16~20) : Penitence - Confession
- The amount of SP healed by the first line of this buff is based on the enhancement Stage (enhancement Stage x 2)

PenanceSecond.name: Penitence - Periphery
PenanceSecond.desc:
- Heal 4 SP On Hit with Base Skill Coins that gain Penitence
- Max Value : 20
- Unique Charge (fixed Potency)
- Turn Start: gain (Penitence)% of max HP as Shield
- Resource used by certain Skills for additional effects
- Enhances the buff Stage based on Value
· Stage 1 (1~7) : Penitence
· Stage 2 (8~15) : Penitence - Periphery
· Stage 3 (16~20) : Penitence - Confession
- The amount of SP healed by the first line of this buff is based on the enhancement Stage (enhancement Stage x 2)

PenanceThird.name: Penitence - Confession
PenanceThird.desc:
- Heal 6 SP On Hit with Base Skill Coins that gain Penitence
- Max Value : 20
- Unique Charge (fixed Potency)
- Turn Start: gain (Penitence)% of max HP as Shield
- Resource used by certain Skills for additional effects
- Enhances the buff Stage based on Value
· Stage 1 (1~7) : Penitence
· Stage 2 (8~15) : Penitence - Periphery
· Stage 3 (16~20) : Penitence - Confession
- The amount of SP healed by the first line of this buff is based on the enhancement Stage (enhancement Stage x 2)

Emptiness.name: Only Ashes Remain
Emptiness.desc:
- Cannot maintain Red Eyes & Penitence
- When gaining Red Eyes with Base Skill effects, heal self and 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage by (Red Eyes gained)% of this unit's max HP (2 times per turn)
- When gaining Penitence with Base Skill effects, heal self and 1 ally with the least SP by ((Penitence gained)/2) SP (2 times per turn)
- Turn End: this effect expires

UninvitedGuestPersonality.name: The Uninvited
UninvitedGuestPersonality.desc:
- Max Value: 2
- Upon death, the last attacker heals 3 SP; then, a random ally without this effect gains 2 Stacks of this effect.
- Take +0.5% damage for every Sinking on self (max 10%; for Focused Encounters, count Sinking on each Part separately)
- Turn End: reduced by 1

DevyatDimensionalSack.name: Courier Trunk - Rodion
DevyatDimensionalSack.desc:
- Base Value: 0
- Turn Start: gain 3 Stack
- Stack does not expire upon Retreat; it is stored instead
- At 10+ Stack: raise Min & Max Speed values by 1
- At 20+ Stack: Gain 1 Clash Power Up and 1 Slash Damage Up
- At 30+ Stack:
· On Skill Use, take (Stack/3)% HP damage and (Stack/3) SP damage
· On Turn End, take (Stack/2)% HP damage and (Stack/2) SP damage (applies before Retreat)

DefensiveStance.name: Defensive Stance
DefensiveStance.desc:
- Max Value: 2
- This effect does not compound in potency; stacking it only extends its duration.
- Reduced by 1 at Turn End
- When a unit gains this effect, gain the following effects next turn:
  · Fix this unit's Speed to its minimum value
  · Gain 5 Defense Level Up
  · Each of this unit's Slots gain +(10 / this unit's # of Slots) Aggro
  · When chaining Skills, this unit can draw enemies' attack toward this unit regardless of Speed (Focused Encounters only)
  · Upon Clash Win, trigger Tremor Burst
  · Cannot be Staggered by damage

ConcentratedAttackMeursault.name: Focused Attack - Meursault
ConcentratedAttackMeursault.desc:
<Focused Encounters Only>
The unit that inflicted this Focused Attack gains the following effects based on the target Slot's Focused Attack Stack.
  · 1x Stack: Gain Clash Power +1
  · 2x Stack: Gain Base Power +1
  · 3x Stack: Gain Base Power +1 and Coin Power +1
- Expires if, for a turn, the unit that inflicted it fails to hit the Slot inflicted with their Focused Attack.
- Expires if the unit that inflicted Focused Attack inflicts it on a different Slot.
- Replaced if a different unit inflicts Focused Attack on a Slot already inflicted with Focused Attack.
- At the start of the next turn, if a Slot inflicted with Focused Attack is no longer present, rearrange all Focused Attacks inflicted against the Slots of that Part in the order of Deployment

Snare.name: Lasso
Snare.desc:
- Max Value: 3
- Turn End: gain Rupture Potency equal to this unit's current Speed value (max 5), and gain 1 Bind next turn
- Turn End: reduced by 1

BloodScissorPersonalityFirst.name: Blood-tinged Scissorblades
BloodScissorPersonalityFirst.desc:
- Max Value: 10
- Stage 1 Blood-tinged Scissorblades
- At 10+ Blood-tinged Scissorblades, converts to Blood-tinged Scissorblades II.
- At 20+ Blood-tinged Scissorblades, converts to Blood-tinged Scissorblades III.
- Reverts to previous Stage when the Stack drops below the requirements.
- Blood-tinged Scissorblades does not drop below 1.
- At Blood-tinged Scissorblades II, gain 1 Offense Level Up and 1 Defense Level Down based on the Stack
- At Blood-tinged Scissorblades III, gain 1 Offense Level Up based on the Stack

BloodScissorPersonalitySecond.name: Blood-tinged Scissorblades II
BloodScissorPersonalitySecond.desc:
- Max Value: 20
- Stage 2 Blood-tinged Scissorblades
- Turn Start: gain 1 Offense Level Up and 1 Defense Level Down for every 5 Stack
- At 10+ Blood-tinged Scissorblades, converts to Blood-tinged Scissorblades II.
- At 20+ Blood-tinged Scissorblades, converts to Blood-tinged Scissorblades III.
- Reverts to previous Stage when the Stack drops below the requirements.
- Blood-tinged Scissorblades does not drop below 1.
- At Blood-tinged Scissorblades II, gain 1 Offense Level Up and 1 Defense Level Down based on the Stack
- At Blood-tinged Scissorblades III, gain 1 Offense Level Up based on the Stack

BloodScissorPersonalityThird.name: Blood-tinged Scissorblades III
BloodScissorPersonalityThird.desc:
- Max Value: 30
- Stage 3 Blood-tinged Scissorblades
- Turn Start: gain 1 Offense Level Up for every 5 Stack
- At 10+ Blood-tinged Scissorblades, converts to Blood-tinged Scissorblades II.
- At 20+ Blood-tinged Scissorblades, converts to Blood-tinged Scissorblades III.
- Reverts to previous Stage when the Stack drops below the requirements.
- Blood-tinged Scissorblades does not drop below 1.
- At Blood-tinged Scissorblades II, gain 1 Offense Level Up and 1 Defense Level Down based on the Stack
- At Blood-tinged Scissorblades III, gain 1 Offense Level Up based on the Stack

LineCuttingPersonality.name: Sewing Target
LineCuttingPersonality.desc:
- Max Value: 1
- Take +0.5% damage for every Bleed on self (max 10%)
- Turn End: reduced by 1

RoseWedge.name: Rose Wedge
RoseWedge.desc:
- Max Potency: 10
- Max Count: 4
- Gain 1 Potency every time this unit takes 10 Bleed damage
- When gaining Bleed or 'Unique Bleed' from getting hit, gain 2 Bleed and inflict 1 Bleed against the Attacker. (5 times per turn)
· At 10 Potency, gain +1 Bleed Count as well when triggering the above effect.
- Turn End: lose 1 Count
- Combat End: at 10 Potency or 1 Count, this effect expires, and this unit takes (Potency x 10) Lust damage.
- If the unit inflicted with this effect dies, or when this effect expires: increase Bloodfeast by (Potency x 10), and deal (Potency x 2) Lust damage against all of its allies (min 1)

ThirstyRose.name: Polydipsic Rose
ThirstyRose.desc:
- Max Value: 5
- Turn End: at 10+ Bleed Potency, take Lust damage equal to 1% of this unit's max HP. (max 30)
- Turn End: reduced by 1

BloodyHandGregFirst.name: Bloodied Hand
BloodyHandGregFirst.desc:
- Max Value: 10
- Stage 1 Bloodied Hand
- At 10+ Bloodied Hand, converts to Bloodied Hand II.
- At 20+ Bloodied Hand, converts to Bloodied Hand III.
- Reverts to previous Stage when the Stack drops below the requirements.
- At Bloodied Hand II, gain 1 Offense Level Up based on the Stack
- At Bloodied Hand III, gain 1 Offense Level Up based on the Stack, and additionally inflict 1 Rupture and 1 Bleed On Hit with Base Skills

BloodyHandGregSecond.name: Bloodied Hand II
BloodyHandGregSecond.desc:
- Max Value: 20
- Stage 2 Bloodied Hand
- Turn Start: gain 1 Offense Level Up for every 10 Stack
- At 10+ Bloodied Hand, converts to Bloodied Hand II.
- At 20+ Bloodied Hand, converts to Bloodied Hand III.
- Reverts to previous Stage when the Stack drops below the requirements.
- At Bloodied Hand II, gain 1 Offense Level Up based on the Stack
- At Bloodied Hand III, gain 1 Offense Level Up based on the Stack, and additionally inflict 1 Rupture and 1 Bleed On Hit with Base Skills

BloodyHandGregThird.name: Bloodied Hand III
BloodyHandGregThird.desc:
- Max Value: 30
- Stage 3 Bloodied Hand
- Turn Start: gain 1 Offense Level Up for every 10 Stack
- On Hit with Base Skills: additionally inflict 1 Rupture and 1 Bleed
- At 10+ Bloodied Hand, converts to Bloodied Hand II.
- At 20+ Bloodied Hand, converts to Bloodied Hand III.
- Reverts to previous Stage when the Stack drops below the requirements.
- At Bloodied Hand II, gain 1 Offense Level Up based on the Stack
- At Bloodied Hand III, gain 1 Offense Level Up based on the Stack, and additionally inflict 1 Rupture and 1 Bleed On Hit with Base Skills

WornHeartGreg.name: Ailing Heart
WornHeartGreg.desc:
- Max Value: 10
- Turn End: gain 1 Stack
- Turn Start: gain 1 Defense Level Up for every 3 Stack
- At 50%- HP, gain 1 Defense Level for every 3 Stack
- At 40%- HP, On Hit with Base Skills, heal (Stack x 5)% of damage dealt On Hit as HP (min 1; rounded down; heal up to 30 HP per Skill)

BloomingThornsRodionFirst.name: Blooming Thorn
BloomingThornsRodionFirst.desc:
- Max Value: 10
- Stage 1 Blooming Thorn
- Gain 1 Defense Level for every 2 Stack (max 5)
- When hit, inflict 1 Bleed against the attacker and lose 1 Stack
- [The Princess of La Manchaland Rodion Only]
· At max Stack, convert to the next Stage of this effect.
· Inflict +(Stage - 1) more Bleed and Rupture Potency with this unit's Base Attack Skill Coin effects.
· Reverts to previous Stage when the Stack drops below the requirements.

BloomingThornsRodionSecond.name: Blooming Thorn II
BloomingThornsRodionSecond.desc:
- Max Value: 20
- Stage 2 Blooming Thorn
- Gain 1 Defense Level for every 2 Stack (max 5)
- When hit, inflict 1 Bleed against the attacker and lose 1 Stack
- [The Princess of La Manchaland Rodion Only]
· At max Stack, convert to the next Stage of this effect.
· Inflict +(Stage - 1) more Bleed and Rupture with this unit's Base Attack Skill Coin effects.
· Reverts to previous Stage when the Stack drops below the requirements.

BloomingThornsRodionThird.name: Blooming Thorn III
BloomingThornsRodionThird.desc:
- Max Value: 30
- Stage 3 Blooming Thorn
- Gain 1 Defense Level for every 2 Stack (max 5)
- When hit, inflict 1 Bleed against the attacker and lose 1 Stack
- [The Princess of La Manchaland Rodion Only]
· At max Stack, convert to the next Stage of this effect.
· Inflict +(Stage - 1) more Bleed and Rupture with this unit's Base Attack Skill Coin effects.
· Reverts to previous Stage when the Stack drops below the requirements.

FestivalFeverRodion.name: Festive Fever
FestivalFeverRodion.desc:
- Max Value: 10
- Expires at Turn End
- Against targets with Bleed: deal +1.5% damage for every Stack
- Skills that consume or gain Bloodfeast deal +3% damage for every Stack instead

DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair.name: Courier Trunk - Sinclair
DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair.desc:
- Base Value: 0
- Turn Start: gain 3 Stack
- Stack does not expire upon Retreat; it is stored instead
- At 10+ Stack: raise Min & Max Speed values by 1
- At 20+ Stack: Gain 1 Clash Power Up and 1 Blunt Damage Up
- At 30+ Stack:
· On Skill Use, take (Stack/3)% HP damage and (Stack/3) SP damage
· On Turn End, take (Stack/2)% HP damage and (Stack/2) SP damage (applies before Retreat)

SwirlingBloodPersonality.name: Shimmering【Bloodfiend】
SwirlingBloodPersonality.desc:
- Max Stack: 50
- As long as this effect exists, all Bleed damage taken by the Shield HP is converted to Bloodfeast.
- Gain Shield HP equal to the Stack at the moment of its application
- Expires at Turn End

BloodArmorPersonalityFirst.name: Hardblood
BloodArmorPersonalityFirst.desc:
- Max Stack: 10
- Stage 1 Hardblood
- At 10+ Hardblood, converts to Hardblood II.
- At 20+ Hardblood, converts to Hardblood III.
- Reverts to the previous Stage when the Stack drops below the requirements.
- Hardblood does not drop below 1.
- Raise Min & Max Speed values by 1 for every 10 Hardblood
- At Hardblood II, gain 1 Offense Level Up based on the Stack
- At Hardblood III, gain 1 Offense Level Up and 1 Defense Level Up based on the Stack

BloodArmorPersonalitySecond.name: Hardblood II
BloodArmorPersonalitySecond.desc:
- Max Stack: 20
- Stage 2 Hardblood
- Turn Start: gain 1 Offense Level Up for every 5 Stack
- Raise Min & Max Speed values by 1
- At 10+ Hardblood, converts to Hardblood II.
- At 20+ Hardblood, converts to Hardblood III.
- Reverts to the previous Stage when the Stack drops below the requirements.
- Hardblood does not drop below 1.
- At Hardblood II, gain 1 Offense Level Up based on the Stack
- At Hardblood III, gain 1 Offense Level Up and 1 Defense Level Up based on the Stack

BloodArmorPersonalityThird.name: Hardblood III
BloodArmorPersonalityThird.desc:
- Max Stack: 30
- Stage 3 Hardblood
- Turn Start: gain 1 Offense Level Up and 1 Defense Level Up for every 5 Stack
- Raise Min & Max Speed values by 2
- At 10+ Hardblood, converts to Hardblood II.
- At 20+ Hardblood, converts to Hardblood III.
- Reverts to the previous Stage when the Stack drops below the requirements.
- Hardblood does not drop below 1.
- At Hardblood II, gain 1 Offense Level Up based on the Stack
- At Hardblood III, gain 1 Offense Level Up and 1 Defense Level Up based on the Stack

SadLamanchaland.name: Responsibility
SadLamanchaland.desc:
- Max Value: 1
- Clash Power +1
- Deal +20% damage
- Take +20% damage

FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_1st.name: The First Magic Bullet
FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_1st.desc:
- Deals +20% damage
- Raise the target's Stagger Threshold by damage dealt (max 30)

FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_2nd.name: The Second Magic Bullet
FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_2nd.desc:
- Deal +10% damage
- Deal damage to targets other than the main target (max targets: 4); the main target takes 0 damage
- On Hit, inflict 3 Paralyze

FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_3rd.name: The Third Magic Bullet
FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_3rd.desc:
- Deal +20% damage
- Before Attack: gain +2 Atk Weight
- On Hit, inflict 2 Attack Power Down and 10 Burn

FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_4th.name: The Fourth Magic Bullet
FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_4th.desc:
- Deal +30% damage
- Before Attack: gain +3 Atk Weight
- On Hit, raise the target's Stagger Threshold by damage dealt (max 20); then, inflict 3 Fragility next turn

FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_5th.name: The Fifth Magic Bullet
FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_5th.desc:
- Deal +30% damage
- Before Attack: gain +4 Atk Weight
- On Hit, inflict 10 Burn; then, inflict 4 Offense Level down and 4 Defense Level Down next turn

FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_6th.name: The Sixth Magic Bullet
FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_6th.desc:
- Before Attack: gain +6 Atk Weight
- On Hit, raise the target's Stagger Threshold by damage dealt (max 30)
- Reuse the Coin for every 7 Burn on the main target (2 times max)
- Plus Coin Skill Base Power -16
- Minus Coin Skill Base Power -22
 - Plus Coin Power -8
 - Minus Coin Power -12

FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_7th.name: The Seventh Magic Bullet
FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_7th.desc:
- Deal +200% damage
- Deal +2.5% damage for every 1% missing HP on target (max 200%)
- Before Attack: for this attack, if the Pierce Damage Res. on target or on self are less than 2.0, change them to Fatal(x2.0)
- After Attack: kills this unit

LogicAtelierAM.name: Concentration【Sniper】
LogicAtelierAM.desc:
- Max Stack: 4
- Turn End: gain 1 Stack

GlowingLantern.name: Fairy Lure
GlowingLantern.desc:
- Max Stack: 5
- Turn Start: leftmost Slot on the Dashboard gains +10 Aggro
- Take +50% damage
- When hit, inflict 1 Rupture against the Attacker (3 times per target's Skill)
· At less than 50% HP, inflict 1 additional Rupture
· If the target has 15+ Rupture, this effect does not inflict Rupture
- Reduced by 1 at Turn End

HoldingBreath.name: Deep Inhale
HoldingBreath.desc:
- Max Stack: 20
- On Crit, at 15+ Poise Potency and 5+ Poise Count, consume (Poise Potency on self / 5) Poise Potency to deal +(Poise Potency consumed x 4)% damage on Critical Hit and lose 1 Stack

NebulizerInhale.name: Nebulizer β
NebulizerInhale.desc:
- Max Stack: 5
- This effect persists throughout the Encounter
- When activating Pride A-Reson.: on Combat Start, apply 3 Poise and +3 Poise Count on self and (Stack) allies (prioritizes allies that gain or use Poise or Poise Count; among them, prioritize allies with the least Poise Potency)

BlackCloud.name: Dark Cloud
BlackCloud.desc:
Max Stack: 1
Converts all of this unit's Base Attack Skill Coins used this turn to [Unbreakable Coins], prevents damage from Staggering this unit until Skill End, and inflict +1 more of Bleed effects
On Clash Lose: gain Final Power +3
Turn End: this effect expires

BlackCloudBlade.name: Dark Cloud Blade
BlackCloudBlade.desc:
Max Stack: 1
Gain 1 Slash Power
Inflict 1 Bleed On Hit with Slash Skills

EngageToBattle.name: Battle Ready
EngageToBattle.desc:
Max Value: 1
Bleed Potency and Count inflicted with this unit's Skill or Coin effects: +1
Gain 1 Slash Power Up and 3 Slash DMG Up for the duration of this Encounter

CloudWall.name: Cumulus Wall
CloudWall.desc:
Max Stack: 1
Defense Skill Final Power +1
This effect expires at Turn End or after attack of the following: 'Rules of the Backstreets'

NebulizerExhale.name: Nebulizer α
NebulizerExhale.desc:
- Max Stack: 5
- This effect persists throughout the Encounter
- Combat Start: on all allies, including this unit, apply 1 Poise Potency and +1 Poise Count

ReleaseBreath.name: Shallow Exhale
ReleaseBreath.desc:
- Max Value: 1
- At 20+ Poise Potency, gain +1 Count as well whenever this unit gains Poise Potency with Skill and Coin effects
- Expires at Turn End

DianxueDonQuixote.name: Nerve Strike - Don Quixote
DianxueDonQuixote.desc:
- Max Stack: 3
- The unit that inflicted this Nerve Strike gains the following effects based on target's(or targeted Part's) Nerve Strike Stack
· 1x Stack: Gain Clash Power +1
· 2x Stack: Gain Base Power +1
· 3x Stack: Gain Clash Power +1 and Base Power +1
- Expires if the unit that inflicted it inflicts this effect against a different target(or a different Part)
- Replaced when another unit inflicts Nerve Strike

FirePunchFuel.name: District 12 Fuel
FirePunchFuel.desc:
Max Stack: 100
Consumed by certain Skills.
At 50- Stack, become Overheated Fuel

FirePunchFuelOverheated.name: Overheated Fuel
FirePunchFuelOverheated.desc:
Max Stack: 100
Consuming District 12 Fuel in Overheated Fuel State consumes Overheated Fuel instead
Consuming Overheated Fuel counts as consuming District 12 Fuel
At over 50 Stack, become District 12 Fuel

VengeanceBookSinclair.name: Book of Vengeance [Sinclair]
VengeanceBookSinclair.desc:
- Max Stack: 30
- Deal more damage equal to (Stack)% (max 30%)
- Gain the following effects next turn based on Stack:
· At 10+ Stack: gain 1 Blunt DMG Up
· At 20+ Stack: Max Speed +1, gain 1 Power Up
· At 30 Stack: gain 2 Blunt DMG Up

VendettaMark.name: Vendetta Mark
VendettaMark.desc:
- Max Stack: 10
- Consumed by certain Skills or Passives
- Take +2% damage from The Middle enemies for every Stack (max 20%)
- Turn End: the unit with the highest Stack of this effect gains 1 Sibling Vengeance Mark next turn
(Counted separately from Vengeance Mark; if more than a single unit has the highest Stack of this effect, this effect targets the one with a higher HP percentage)

RetaliationBookFamily.name: Sibling Vengeance Mark
RetaliationBookFamily.desc:
- Max Stack: 1
- Expires at Turn End
- Every Identity treats this unit as having their Vengeance Mark

BirdCage.name: Searing Birdcage
BirdCage.desc:
Max Stack: 5
If this unit has Burn, Wrath Resistance +0.1 for every Stack (cannot exceed 2.0 Wrath Resistance with this effect)
Turn End: gain Bind equal to Stack next turn
Turn End: halve Stack (rounded down)
※ Cannot gain additional Stacks of this effect while it is already active

WaitingXichun.name: Ready [待]
WaitingXichun.desc:
- Max Stack: 3
- Number of turns this unit spent in Retreat or as a Backup unit

StartXichun.name: Launcher [始]
StartXichun.desc:
- Max Stack: 6
- Number of turns this unit spent active in the Encounter
- Expires upon Retreat
- Gain 1 Stack at Turn End

CheerUpXichun.name: Assist [援]
CheerUpXichun.desc:
- Max Stack: 1
- If target has 5+ types of negative effects, Clash Power +1, deal +10% damage

BulletPropellantAlly.name: Tigermark Round
BulletPropellantAlly.desc:
- Unique Ammo
- At 8+ (cumulative sum of Tigermark Rounds and Savage Tigermark Rounds spent), gain Unrelenting Spirit - Shin [剛氣-心] instead of Unrelenting Spirit [剛氣] from this unit's Passive
- Max Capacity: 12

BulletPropellantSpecialAlly.name: Savage Tigermark Round
BulletPropellantSpecialAlly.desc:
- Unique Ammo
- At 8+ (cumulative sum of Tigermark Rounds and Savage Tigermark Rounds spent), gain Unrelenting Spirit - Shin [剛氣-心] instead of Unrelenting Spirit [剛氣] from this unit's Passive
- Actives the same way as Tigermark Round does
- Max Capacity: 8

IrritationAlly.name: Unrelenting Spirit [剛氣]
IrritationAlly.desc:
- Min & Max Speed +1
- If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's by 3 or more, deal +(Speed difference x 2.5)% damage (max 20%)
- Inflict +1 more Tremor Potency and Tremor Count with this unit's Skills
- If this unit has spent 8+ (sum of Tigermark Round and Savage Tigermark Round): at Turn End, convert this buff to Unrelenting Spirit - Shin [剛氣-心] next turn
- Max Stack: 1

HugeIrritationAlly.name: Unrelenting Spirit - Shin [剛氣-心]
HugeIrritationAlly.desc:
- Min & Max Speed +3
- If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's by 3 or more, deal +(Speed difference x 5)% damage (max 40%)
- Inflict +2 more Tremor Potency and Tremor Count with this unit's Skills
- Max Stack: 1

BeastEyesAlly.name: Overheat
BeastEyesAlly.desc:
- Loses this effect when this unit gains Savage Tigermark Round
- Min & Max Speed +2
- Base Attack Skills Lose (cumulative number of Tigermark & Savage Tigermark Rounds spent / 2) Clash Power (max 10); however, gain the following effects(cumulative):
· 8+ Rounds spent: Gain 1 Protection for every 10% missing HP on self at Turn Start (max 5)
· 14+ Rounds spent: On Clash Lose, Unbreakable Coins of this unit's Base Attack Skills deal +(75 + missing HP percentage on self)% damage (max 150%)
· 20+ Rounds Spent: Deal +(HP percentage difference)% damage against targets with higher remaining HP percentage than this unit (max 50%; except E.G.O Skills)

FireBulletPropellant.name: Scorch Propellant Ammo
FireBulletPropellant.desc:
- Max Capacity: 15
- Unique Ammo
- Spent by certain Skills

SingBulletSupport.name: (엄지 싱클 탄환 보급 받는 대상 이펙트)

FellBulletPersonality.name: Fell Bullet
FellBulletPersonality.desc:
Max Stack: 1
+3% damage on Critical Hit for every Torn Memory (max 18%)
On Hit, inflict 1 Bleed (3 per turn)
On Kill, gain 3 Poise and +2 Poise Count (2 times per turn)
Expires at Turn End

RoseThorn.name: Gluttonous Thorn (貪食棘)
RoseThorn.desc:
Max Stack: 9

Turn End: gain Bleed Count equal to Lust Reson., then lose 1 Gluttonous Thorn (貪食棘). (max Bleed Count gain: 5)

While this unit has this effect, if it gains Bleed Potency beyond 99, increase Bloodfeast equal to the excess Bleed Potency; then, gain Defense Level Down next turn equal to Bloodfeast increased (max Defense Level Down gain: 5)

BlessingAlly.name: Blessing
BlessingAlly.desc:
- Turn Start: gain 1 Protecting Sword for every 8 SP (max 5)
- When Clash ends, inflict 2 Sinking (once per turn)
- When hit, inflict 2 Sinking on the attacker (once per turn)
- For every 20 SP, inflict +1 more Sinking Potency with above effects (max 2)
- Replace this unit's Base Skills with Plus Coin Skills

ProtectiveSword.name: Protecting Sword
ProtectiveSword.desc:
- Turn Start: gain 1 Defense Level Up for every Stack (max 5)
- Turn Start: +(Stack x 3) Aggro to the leftmost Skill Slot on the Dashboard (max 15)
- Max Stack: 5
- Expires at Turn End

DespairAlly.name: Despair
DespairAlly.desc:
- Turn Start: gain 1 Piercing Sword for every -8 SP (max 5)
- When Clash ends, inflict +1 Sinking Count (once per turn)
- On Hit with the first Coin of a Base Attack Skill, inflict +1 Sinking Count (once per turn)
- For every -20 SP, inflict +1 more Sinking Count with above effects (max 2)
- Replace this unit's Base Skills with Minus Coin Skills

PenetratingSword.name: Piercing Sword
PenetratingSword.desc:
- Turn Start: gain 1 Offense Level Up for every Stack (max 5)
- Turn Start: -(Stack x 0.15) Aggro to all Skill Slots on the Dashboard (max 0.75)
- Max Stack: 5
- Expires at Turn End

SwordCutwithTear.name: Tear-sharpened
SwordCutwithTear.desc:
- Turn Start: gain 5 Deep Tears
· At 3 Stack, gain additional 5 Deep Tears
- Turn End: lose (Stack x 15) SP
- Base Attack Skills deal +(Stack x 10)% damage (max 30%)
- If this unit has Blessing, gain Clash Power Up by the effect's Stack at Turn Start
- If this unit has Despair, gain Pierce Power Up by the effect's Stack at Turn Start
- Max Stack: 3

BlackTearsAlly.name: Deep Tears
BlackTearsAlly.desc:
- Unique Charge (fixed Potency)
- Resource used by certain skills for additional effects
- Max Stack: 20

MagicalGirlResponse.name: Magical Girl's Chant
MagicalGirlResponse.desc:
- Max Stack: 2
- When gaining this effect, gain 1 Attack Power Up and 1 Damage Up
- This unit's Attack Skills that gain or consume Charge Count gain Final Power +1 and deal +10% damage
- Reduced by 1 at Turn End

ChoSuperCharge.name: Near-light Superbattery
ChoSuperCharge.desc:
- Max Stack: 100
- When consuming Charge Count, add the amount consumed to this buff's Stack
- Max Charge Count Cap +10
- Gain 1 Charge Count when allies gain Charge Potency or Count
- When this unit consumes Charge Count with its Skills, consume the same amount of Charge Count 1 more time (when there isn't enough Charge Count, consume as much as available)
- Deal +10% damage for every 10 Stack
- Enemies gain +0.1 Resistance against this unit's attacks for every 20 Stack (max +0.5 Resist; does not activate against Staggered enemies)
- When the Identity with this effect dies, the buff transfers to the ally who is second earliest to this unit in the Deployment order. The Stack carries over as well.
- This effect works on 'Unique Charge' as well.

ShareCharge.name: Self Resonance Circuitry
ShareCharge.desc:
Total sum of Charge Count currently owned by all allies

On Hit with a Skill: deal +(sum of charge count on all allies / 3)% damage
All allies gain 1 Offense Level Up for every 100 cumulative Charge Count consumed by allies

HystericGauge.name: Hysteria
HystericGauge.desc:
- Base Stack: 0
- Max Stack: 3
- At Turn End...
· At 0 or higher SP, lose 1 Stack
· At less than 0 SP, gain 1 Stack

MagicalGirlAppear.name: Here Comes Magical Girl!
MagicalGirlAppear.desc:
- For this turn, this unit uses Plus Coin Base Attack Skills

- Base Attack Skills deal +3% damage for every Love/Hate on self (max 15%)

NoVillain.name: Regressive Transformation - Reversed
NoVillain.desc: - For this turn, this unit uses Minus Coin Base Attack Skills

VillainMark.name: Mark of Villainy
VillainMark.desc:
- Take +10% damage from Don Quixote

- Applies only to the first target to receive the effect in each turn

ArcanaQueenOfHate.name: Magical Arcana
ArcanaQueenOfHate.desc:
- Max Stack: 3
- Base Attack Skills deal +(Stack x 5)% damage
- Turn End: At 3 Stack and with -25 or higher SP, change SP to -25

ThePowerOfLoveAndHate.name: Love/Hate
ThePowerOfLoveAndHate.desc:
- Max Count: 20
- Unique Charge
- Resource used by certain skills for additional effects. Its Count can go up to 20. Count lowers by 1 at the end of each turn.
(Interacts the same way as normal Charge does to effects that raise or reduce Charge Potency/Count)

OutisNoHat.name: Violent Collections
OutisNoHat.desc:
- If this unit has Haste, gain +1 more Tremor Count from its Base Skills
- If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's, deal +(Speed difference x 3)% damage (max 15%)

AccumulatedPastSinner.name: Accumulated Past
AccumulatedPastSinner.desc:
- Max Stack: 12
- Turn Start: gain 1 Clash Power Up and 1 Offense Level Up for every 3 Stack

HeishouDeathCount.name: Life from Death [死中求活]
HeishouDeathCount.desc:
- Max Stack: 5
- Turn Start: activate the following
· Gain 1 Offense Level Up for every 1 Stack (max 5)
· Gain 1 Damage Up for every 2 Stack (max 2)
· Gain 1 Attack Power Up at 3+ Stack

HeishouCombo.name: Exalted Command
HeishouCombo.desc:
- If unit A applies this effect to unit B: Unit B follows up with an Unopposed Attack with its Base Skill 3 against the same enemy unit A attacked with its Skill. Activates at unit A's Attack End. (Does not activate as Empowered Skills)
- The Skill used as an Assist Attack does not affect Unit B's upcoming Skills list.
- Does not activate if affected ally's Skill 3 is not unlocked.

HeishouComboCount.name: Unrelenting Storm
HeishouComboCount.desc:
- Number of times this unit activated combo with The Lord of Hongyuan Hong Lu Identity
- Max Stack: 2
- Turn Start: gain 1 Offense Level Up and 1 Defense Level Up for every Stack

HeishouAttack.name: Your Will Guides My Blade.
HeishouAttack.desc:
- If unit A applies this effect to unit B: Unit B follows up with an Unopposed Attack with its Skill 1 against the same enemy unit A attacked with its Skill. Activates at unit A's Skill Attack End.
- The Skill used as an Assist Attack does not affect Unit B's upcoming Skills list.

HeishouSupportProtect.name: Lordsguard
HeishouSupportProtect.desc:
- Unique Assist Defense
- Max Stack: 1
- When The Lord of Hongyuan Hong Lu is about to take an Unopposed Attack from an enemy, consume 1 Stack to redirect the enemy's targeting to self; then, copy and use The Lord of Hongyuan Hong Lu's 'Lordsguard' Skill
- When there are multiple allies with Assist Defense Stacks, the ally with the highest Stack has the highest activation priority
- This effect counts as Assist Defense, and is counted toward calculating Assist Defense Stacks
- Expires at Turn End

HeishouSynergy.name: Leash-holder of All Heishou
HeishouSynergy.desc:
- Max Stack: 11
- Gain the following effects based on Stack:
· For every 1 Stack, gain 1 Max Speed (max 5) and deal +1% damage with Skills
· For every 2 Stack, gain 1 Min Speed (max 2) and 1 Defense Level Up (max 5)
· For every 3 Stack, gain 1 Offense Level Up (max 3)
· At 5+ Stack, gain 1 Damage Up and apply 1 Offense Level Up to all Heishou Pack Identities

HeishouComboCountHonglu.name: Heishou Bolus Contamination [黑獣丸染]
HeishouComboCountHonglu.desc:
- Max Stack: 11
- Empowers The Lord of Hongyuan Hong Lu based on which Heishou he activated combo with
- The Heishou Bolus Contamination effects can stack with each other

· Heishou - Mao Adept Faust: take -5% damage from Skills
· Heishou - Mao Ryōshū: if this unit's Speed is faster than the target's, deal +5% damage
· Heishou - Mao Outis: inflict +1 Rupture Count On Hit with Unopposed Attacks (once per turn)
· Heishou - Si Rodion: Inflict 1 Rupture On Critical Hit (3 times per turn)
· Heishou - Si Gregor: Gain +1 Poise Count when dealing Rupture damage (once per turn)

ChickenStance.name: Bloodflame [血炎]
ChickenStance.desc:
- Max Stack: 3
- This unit inflicts +1 more Burn and Rupture Potency with its Base Skills
- While this unit has this effect, heal 3 SP upon Staggering or killing an enemy (3 times per turn)
· If this unit's SP is at max when the above effect activates, gain 1 Offense Level Up and 1 Haste next turn
- Lose 1 Stack at Turn End

ChickenFightlust.name: Battleblood Instinct
ChickenFightlust.desc:
- Max Stack: 20
- For every Stack, deal +0.75% damage
- For every 10 Stack, gain 1 Haste next turn

LegStrengthHorseYisang.name: Strider【Wu】
LegStrengthHorseYisang.desc:
- Max Stack: 3
- Turn End: gain 2 Haste and (Stack x 2) Aggro next turn
- Before Attack: inflict (Stack) Tremor Potency against the main target (max 6 per turn)
- Lose 1 Stack at Turn End

ConcussionYisang.name: Concussion
ConcussionYisang.desc:
- Max Stack: 2
- Multiply the amount of Stagger Threshold raised by Tremor Burst and Rupture damage dealt against this unit by 1.2 (rounded down)
- Lose 1 Stack at Turn End

BreakthroughHorse.name: Linebreaker
BreakthroughHorse.desc:
- Max Stack: 5
- Turn Start: gain (Stack x 10) Shield for the turn
- At max Stack, gain 2 Final Power
- When hit: if this unit took 100+ damage from a single Skill, gain 1 Protection after that Skill ends (2 times per turn; includes damage against Shield HP; does not count damage from Keywords)

BattlefieldHorse.name: Commanding Cry
BattlefieldHorse.desc:
- Gain 1 Clash Power and 2 Defense Level
- Expires at Turn End

GazeRyoshu.name: Gaze
GazeRyoshu.desc:
- Max Stack: 7
- Take and deal +10% damage from and against Ryōshū for every 1 Stack of Gaze
- On death, transfers to this unit's ally(for Focused Encounters, a different Part) either without or with the least Contempt or Gaze (this effect does not activate if this unit was killed during the Skill attack 'Cascading Gaze of Awe Underneath Contempt')
- Turn End: at 7 Stacks, convert this effect into Contempt next turn

ContemptRyoshu.name: Contempt
ContemptRyoshu.desc:
- Max Stack: 1
- Take and deal -50% damage from and against Ryōshū
- Targets with Contempt cannot gain Gaze
- On death, transfers to this unit's ally(for Focused Encounters, a different Part) either without or with the least Contempt or Gaze (this effect does not activate if this unit was killed during the Skill attack 'Cascading Gaze of Awe Underneath Contempt')
- Turn End: expires; then, this unit gains 7 Gaze next turn

VibrationBleeding.name: Tremor - Hemorrhage
VibrationBleeding.desc:
- On Tremor Burst, take Lust Damage equal to (sum of Tremor Potency and Bleed Potency / 2), and lose 1 Bleed Count
- When hit by Skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise this unit's Stagger Threshold by the effect's Potency
- Turn End: reduce the Count by 1
(Interacts the same way as normal Tremor does to effects that raise or reduce Tremor Potency/Count)

CuredFilm.name: Hardened Shell-Barrier
CuredFilm.desc:
- Turn Start: gain (Stack / 3) Defense Level Up (max 3; rounded down)
- Immediately before getting hit by an enemy, consume half of Hardened Shell-Barrier and gain Protection equal to the Stack consumed (once per turn, rounded up)
- Turn End: lose 3 Stack
- Max Stack: 10

MlynarWaiting.name: Man in Scabbard
MlynarWaiting.desc:
- Max Stack: 40
- For every (Stack / 8), gain 1 Aggro (max 5; rounded down; affects the leftmost Skill Slot on the Dashboard)
- For every (Stack / 20), gain 1 Protection (max 2; rounded down)
- Gain 10 Stacks at Turn End
※ Can gain up to 20 per turn

Cianjing.name: Thunderer
Cianjing.desc:
- Turn Start: gain 1 Offense Level Up and 1 Defense Level Up
- Turn End: lose 1 Stack
- Max Stack: 5

SeniorCianjing.name: Higher Thunderer
SeniorCianjing.desc:
- Turn Start: gain 2 Offense Level Up and 2 Defense Level Up
- Turn End: lose 1 Stack
- Max Stack: 5

ArrowShiFau.name: Arrow - Shi
ArrowShiFau.desc:
- Min Capacity: 0
- Max Capacity: 4
- Arrows spent by certain Skills

ArrowInTheEyeFau.name: Lodged Arrow
ArrowInTheEyeFau.desc:
- Max Stack: 4
- Turn Start: gain Bleed Potency by Stack
- Lose Defense Level by Stack
- Turn End: at 2+ Stack, gain 1 Fragile next turn (once per turn)
- Expires on: Death, Retreat, buff removal/expiration. When it expires, apply Arrow - Shi to Shi East Section 3 Faust by Stack

AimForTheGoal.name: Target Aim
AimForTheGoal.desc:
- Max Stack: 4
- Expires if this unit does not have "Ready to Loose"

SnipingArrowMode.name: Ready to Loose
SnipingArrowMode.desc:
- When this unit has this effect, activate the following:
· Converts the leftmost Base Attack Skill on the Dashboard to "Bow's Glimmer", then uses it at Combat Start
· This unit cannot be Staggered from taking damage, Tremor Burst, or raised Stagger Threshold
· Does not trigger Assist Attack
· Removed if an E.G.O Skill was equipped at Combat Start

AStrokeOfDeath.name: Liferender
AStrokeOfDeath.desc:
- Offense Level +2
- Final Power +1
- Expires at Turn End

BloodArmorMeursault.name: Hardblood Armor
BloodArmorMeursault.desc:
- Max Stack: 5

FocusOnActing.name: Focused Performance
FocusOnActing.desc:

- Skill 3 gains Final Power +2; deals +10% damage for every Stack (max 30%)

ParadeConcentration.name: La Mancha Parade
ParadeConcentration.desc:
- Max Stack: 4
- Take +10% damage from Lust Skills

• At max Stack, deal -20% damage against <La Manchaland> Identities
- Lose 1 Stack either after this unit's Skill hits and ends or after the Skill that attacked this unit hits and ends

WOverCharge.name: Overcharge
WOverCharge.desc:
- Max Value : 1
- Become Immobilized
- Take 10 + (Charge Potency on self x 5)% less damage (max 25%)
- Turn Start: Gain Charge Barrier based on Charge Potency on self (max 5)
- Turn End: Gain +10 Charge Count and 2 Attack Power Up next turn, and lose this effect
- Gain Aggro to this unit's leftmost Slot based on Charge Potency on self (max 5)
- When hit, gain +1 Charge Count and 1 Load next turn (max 5 per turn)

HanafudaOne.name: Hand - Pine Crane Suit

HanafudaTwo.name: Hand - Susuki Grass Suit

HanafudaThree.name: Hand - Blue Sakura Suit
HanafudaThree.desc:
- Skill 3 Base Power +1
- When this unit equips and uses a Gloom Base Attack Skill or E.G.O Skill on its leftmost Skill Slot, activate the "forming a Hand" effects on the "Koi-Koi" Passive

HanafudaCombo.name: Bright【光】

- Turn End: Gain (Stack - 1) Bind next turn

HorrHurtNightStiletto.name: Fatal Wound

CrushMarks.name: Shattermark

- Units without SP: Clash Power -1
- Turn End: Reduce 1 Stack

- Panic: Clash Power -2, Defense Level -3 on self

ProtectStanceRyoshu.name: Protector's Stance

DuelDeclaration_Camille.name: Declared Duel - Camille
DuelDeclaration_Camille.desc:
- In a Clash between the unit that inflicted Declared Duel and the unit with the status, the declarer has +1 Clash Power. On Hit, the declarer gains 1 Haste next turn. (4 times per turn)

RecklessDuel.name: Foolhardy Duel

Turn End: gain 1 Bind next turn for every 10% of the missing HP. (max 5)

ConcentratedAttack.name: Focused Attack

- 2 Consecutive hits: Base Power +1
- 3 Consecutive hits: Base Power +1, Coin Power +1

BloodScissor.name: Blood-tinged Scissorblades

BloodDinner_Accumulation.name: Bloodfeast Consumed

StarvingBarberOne.name: Withered

RighteousFeeling.name: HOW RIGHTEOUS!!

GazeReplica.name: Gaze
GazeReplica.desc:
- Max Stack: 7

GahwanEgoContempt.name: Volatile E.G.O Attunement - Contempt

- Lose 1 Offense Level and gain 1 Defense Level for every Stack

GuboEgoShooter.name: Volatile E.G.O Attunement - Fell Bullet
GuboEgoShooter.desc:

Bothersome.name: Severing Slash [切斬]
Bothersome.desc:
- The target's Slash Resistance counts as 'Weak'(1.5). (does not activate against targets with 1.5 or higher Slash Resistance)
- Expires at Turn End

VibrationIgnition.name: Tremor - Scorch
VibrationIgnition.desc:
- On Tremor Burst, take Wrath Damage equal to (sum of Tremor Potency and Burn Potency / 2), and lose 1 Burn Count
- When hit by Skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise this unit's Stagger Threshold by the effect's Potency
- Turn End: reduce the Count by 1
(Interacts the same way as normal Tremor does to effects that raise or reduce Tremor Potency/Count)

BulletPropellant.name: Tigermark Round
BulletPropellant.desc:
- Unique Ammo

BulletPropellantSpecial.name: Savage Tigermark Round
BulletPropellantSpecial.desc:
- Unique Ammo
- Spent by certain Skills (actives the same way as Tigermark Round does)
- The Potency and the Count of this effect are "Loaded Ammo" and "Remaining Ammo", respectively
· Max Potency (Loaded Ammo): 6
- Coins that spent this Ammo deal +30% damage, and inflict double the normal amount of Burn Potency and Count
- When all Loaded Ammo and Remaining Ammo are spent, converts back to Tigermark Round

Prey.name: Prey
Prey.desc:

· If this unit equipped an Attack Skill, deal -50% damage against Lei Heng with Attack Skills

BattleSense.name: Inner Strength [底力]
BattleSense.desc:

- Consumed by certain Skills; at Turn End, heal SP equal to the Stack consumed by the end of the turn

- Turn End: next turn, gain Haste based on the total Stack consumed this turn (1 Haste per 25 Stack; max 2)
- Gains a different buff when using a specific pattern

RestoredBattleSense.desc:

- Turn End: next turn, gain Haste based on the total Stack consumed this turn (1 Haste per 25 Stack, max 5)

When clashing against Skills that turns this unit into a Precious Jade, Clash Power +5; if this unit wins that Clash, this unit does not become a Precious Jade, recovers from Stagger, reduces Jia Mu's SP by 10, and inflicts 2 Fragile against Jia Mu

- This effect counts as a 'Shield Management' effect. (replaced when gaining a different Shield Management effect)

WaitingforCommandMod.name: Standby State
WaitingforCommandMod.desc: - When in Standby State, this unit does not use Attack Skills until it takes damage

ParticipationMod.name: Combat-Ready State
ParticipationMod.desc:
- After taking damage, this unit has begun to use its Attack Skills.
- Turn Start while in Combat-Ready State:
· Inflict 3 Nervous Impairment to all enemies
· Min & Max Speed +3
· Gain 1 Offense Level Up for every 10% missing HP (max 8)
- Turn End while in Combat-Ready State: take fixed damage equal to 10% HP

ColdAirDOQ.name: Cold
ColdAirDOQ.desc:
- Max Stack: 3
- Lose 1 Speed for every Cold Stack
- If this unit has 3 Stacks after Skill End: take 20 Gloom damage and 20 SP damage; then, gain 1 Frozen this turn and next turn.
- Cold Stack expires after all effects are activated
- Turn End: if this unit did not attack The Last Knight, expires

FreezingDOQ.name: Frozen
FreezingDOQ.desc:
- Unique Cold
- Cannot act for this turn
- Certain Skill activations become nullified at 1 HP

NetherseaBrandUnit.name: Nethersea Brand
NetherseaBrandUnit.desc:
- Sinners on top of Nethersea Brand: at Turn End, take fixed damage equal to 5% HP and gain 3 Nervous Impairment
- Greatly increases the Nervous Impairment Stack Sea Terrors on top of Nethersea Brand inflict against Sinners
- Nethersea Brand's influence expands toward Sinner territory with each passing turn
· Stage 1 : Sea Terror territory
· Stage 2 : Affects 2 frontmost Sinners
· Stage 3 : Affects 5 frontmost Sinners
· Stage 4 : Affects all Sinners

NervousImpairment.name: Nervous Impairment
NervousImpairment.desc:
- Max Stack : 30
- At 30 Stack, become Staggered; then, take fixed damage equal to 25% HP, and remove this effect

BitOfEmotion.name: Emotional Connection
BitOfEmotion.desc:
- On Hit against enemies: (50 / # of Coins)% chance to gain 1 E.G.O resource corresponding to the used Skill's Affinity
- When an enemy dies after an allied unit's Skill attack ends, gain 2 least-owned E.G.O Resources
- In an Encounter, gain 1 E.G.O resource of each Affinity consumed when using the following E.G.O Skills (2 of each when using Overclocked Skills)
· To Remain Oneself Hong Lu
· Command : Meltdown Faust
· Unbrilliant Glory Gregor
· Tidal Elegy Ishmael

WildernessSurvivalModule.name: Little Handy - Wilderness Survival Module
WildernessSurvivalModule.desc: - Max HP +20%. Heal +40% more from Skills, Passives, and buff effects

HousekeepingAssistantModule.name: Little Handy - Housekeeping Assistant Module
HousekeepingAssistantModule.desc:
- When activating the Hand of the Saint, it activates again once next turn
- Turn Start: gain Offense Level Up and Defense Level Up equal to the number of times Nethersea Brand was removed by using the Hand of the Saint during this Encounter (max 4 each)

IncrementalMotionFirmware.name: Little Handy - Incremental Motion Firmware
IncrementalMotionFirmware.desc:
- Remove 1 highest Stagger threshold from every allied unit
- When Staggered, immediately recover from Stagger at the start of the next turn (once)

MiniDecontaminationKit.name: Little Handy - Mini Decontamination Kit
MiniDecontaminationKit.desc: - Nethersea Brand no longer inflicts Nervous Impairment or deals damage to allies

ExternalUpgradeModule.name: Little Handy - External Upgrade Module
ExternalUpgradeModule.desc: - For 3 turns after gaining this effect: gain 2 Power Up and 2 Damage Up at the start of each turn (Substituting units earn it in the turn they Substitute in)

MRR501.name: Infliction Refraction
MRR501.desc: +1 to Burn, Bleed, Tremor, Rupture, and Sinking Potency inflicted against enemies with Skills & Coin effects

MRR502.name: Gain Refraction
MRR502.desc: +1 to Poise and Charge Count gained by allies with Skills & Coin effects

MRR503.name: Refracted Mind
MRR503.desc: 3 allies with the least SP heal 8 SP at Turn End (excluding: allies that are Panicked or Corroded)

MRR504.name: 버프 이름
MRR504.desc: On Crit, at more than 20 Poise Potency, consume up to 20 of the excess Poise Potency to deal +(Poise Potency consumed x 2.5)% damage on Critical Hit (max 50%)

MRR505.name: Refracted Charge
MRR505.desc:
On Hit with Skills that consumed 8+ Charge Count: +0.1 to Envy Resistance on the target for this Encounter (once per Skill per enemy; max Resistance adjustment: 0.3)
Skills that gain or consume Charge Count deal +(10 + (Count gained or consumed x 2))% damage (max 50%)

MRR506.name: Refracted Burst
MRR506.desc: Turn End: against all enemy Parts, inflict Wrath damage equal to Burn Potency on each Part; then, reduce their Burn Count by 1, trigger Tremor Burst once, and reduce their Tremor Count by 1 (activates only at 2+ Count)

MRR507.name: Refracted Rupture
MRR507.desc: Rupture Skills that inflict Rupture Potency or Count: Final Power +2

MRR508.name: Refracted Sinking

MRR509.name: Weakness Destroyed

MRR510.name: Nebulizer
MRR510.desc: First Turn Start of a wave: all allies gain 5 Poise Potency and +5 Poise Count. If Pride Reson. was activated, all allies gain 3 Poise Potency and +3 Poise Count at Combat Start

MRR511.name: The Lone Gunman
MRR511.desc: Raise Min & Max Speed values for the #1 Deployed Identity by 1. The said unit loses a Skill 1, but gains a Skill 3

MRR512.name: Lasting Battle Spirit
MRR512.desc: Starting from #7 Deployed Sinner: at the start of the same turn it Substitutes in, heal 30 SP, gain 1 Attack Power Up for the Encounter, and gain 2 E.G.O resource for each one of the Affinities corresponding to their Base Attack Skills

MRR513.name: Resource Reaping
MRR513.desc: After using an Attack or a Counter Skill, if the enemy is defeated, gain 2 E.G.O resource of the Skill Affinity that was used (once per Skill, including E.G.O Skills)

MRR514.name: 버프 이름

Change the Gloom Resistance of the Final Boss of Section 3 to Weak(x1.5)

MRR528.name: Refracted Blunt

Blunt Skills gain Plus Coin Power +1, Minus Coin Power -1
Change the Blunt Resistance of the Final Boss of Section 3 to Weak(x1.5)

MRR531.name: 버프 이름

MRR532.name: Resource Vaporization

MRR533.name: Blossomed Blood

MRR540.name: 버프 이름

MRR521.name: HP Manipulation

MRR522.name: Perilous Contest

MRR523.name: Bloody Banquet
MRR523.desc: On Hit, if the enemy lost HP, heal HP equal to 10% of the damage dealt. All allies lose 3 Bleed Count at Turn End

MRR524.name: Festival of Blood
MRR524.desc: Each ally deals +1% damage for every 10 Bloodfeast they Consumed (max 30%)

MRR543.name: Lasting Determination
MRR543.desc: When defeated, gain E.G.O Resources based on the Affinity & Rank of each Attack Skill this unit has.

MRR544.name: Power Roulette

MRR546.name: High-risk
MRR546.desc:
All allies deal +10% damage
Change the Slash, Pierce, Blunt Resistance of the Final Boss of Section 3 to Weak(x1.3)

MRR547.name: Power Roulette
MRR547.desc: Turn Start: All enemy Skills gain Final Power +1~3

MRR549.name: Life or Death
MRR549.desc: -25% to max HP on all allies

MRR551.name: Refracted Bleed
MRR551.desc: Turn Start: inflict 5 Bleed Potency and +3 Count to enemies at max HP (once per enemy per Part per Encounter)

MRR552.name: 버프 이름
MRR552.desc: Whenever an enemy dies, an enemy gains 2 Clash Power Up next turn, starting from the enemy with the least current HP

MRR557.name: Refracted Poise
MRR557.desc: Deal +(10 + Poise Potency + Poise Count)% damage on Critical Hit (max 50%)

MRR558.name: Refracted Wrath
MRR558.desc:
Wrath Skills deal +30% damage
Change the Wrath Resistance of the Final Boss of Section 3 to Weak(x1.25)

MRR559.name: Refracted Lust
MRR559.desc:
Lust Skills deal +30% damage
Change the Lust Resistance of the Final Boss of Section 3 to Weak(x1.25)

MRR560.name: Refracted Sloth
MRR560.desc:
Sloth Skills deal +30% damage
Change the Sloth Resistance of the Final Boss of Section 3 to Weak(x1.25)

MRR561.name: Refracted Gluttony
MRR561.desc:
Gluttony Skills deal +30% damage
Change the Gluttony Resistance of the Final Boss of Section 3 to Weak(x1.25)

MRR562.name: Refracted Gloom
MRR562.desc:
Gloom Skills deal +30% damage
Change the Gloom Resistance of the Final Boss of Section 3 to Weak(x1.25)

MRR563.name: Refracted Pride
MRR563.desc:
Pride Skills deal +30% damage
Change the Pride Resistance of the Final Boss of Section 3 to Weak(x1.25)

MRR564.name: Refracted Envy
MRR564.desc:
Envy Skills deal +30% damage
Change the Envy Resistance of the Final Boss of Section 3 to Weak(x1.25)

MRR565.name: Comfy

MRR566.name: Hostile Refraction
MRR566.desc: Enemy Clash Power +1; enemies deal +10% damage

KeptBlood.name: Stored Blood
KeptBlood.desc:
- Max Value: 10
- Lose 1 value every time this unit loses 5% HP.
- On Hit, heal 1% of this unit's HP

BloodyCrave.name: Bloodtinged Craving
BloodyCrave.desc:
- Gain 1 Clash Power Up and 1 Damage Up
- On Hit, gain 1 Stored Blood
- If this unit did not gain Stored Blood this turn, gain 2 Fragile, 1 Haste, and 4 Offense Level Up next turn instead of the above effect

HardenedBlood.name: Coagulated Blood
HardenedBlood.desc: Gain Offense Level and Defense Level equal to the value (max 5)

BloodArmorCasting.name: Hardblood Cast
BloodArmorCasting.desc:
- Max Stack: 3
- When clashing against enemies with Bleed or Unique Bleed, Clash Power +1
- When consuming Bloodfeast with an Attack Skill, if there isn't enough Bloodfeast, consume 1 HP for every 1 missing Bloodfeast to generate it before consuming it (the damage from this effect does not Stagger or reduce this unit's HP below 1)
- Reduced by 1 at Turn End

BigWelcome.name: Grand Welcome
BigWelcome.desc: After Attack: if the target is Staggered or defeated, gain +1 Pride E.G.O resource and +1 E.G.O resource for 1 other random Affinity (3 times per turn)

VibrationChain.name: Tremor - Chain
VibrationChain.desc:
- Lose 1 Clash Power for every 10 Tremor Potency on self (max 3)
- When Hit by Skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect's Potency
- Turn End: reduce the Count by 1
- (Interacts the same way as normal Tremor does to effects that raise or reduce Tremor Potency/Count)

TimeRentalTwo.name: T Corp. Borrowed Time
TimeRentalTwo.desc:
Turn End:
- Gain (Borrowed Time Count - 1) Haste, Clash Power Up, and Fragile next turn.
- At 1 Count, gain (2 x (Borrowed Time Stack - 1) Bind next turn instead.
- Gain 1 Stack and lose 1 Count
- If this unit has more Bind than it has Haste, the Borrowed Time effect expires and this unit gets Staggered.

TimeAccumulation.name: Time Delay
TimeAccumulation.desc:
As long as this effect is active, damage dealt against this unit is stored and not taken.
Turn End: reduce value by 1
Turn End: If there is only 1 value left of this effect, the effect expires after dealing (2 x stored damage) Sloth damage to this unit
When this effect is active, its value cannot be gained or be refreshed.

TimeAcceleration.name: Time Acceleration
TimeAcceleration.desc:
- Gain 5 Speed
- Enhances this unit's Skills.
- Gain 1 Fragile; when Tremor Burst, Skill or Coin effect raises this unit's Stagger Threshold, it raises it by +50% more.

LimitedTime.name: Stolen Time
LimitedTime.desc:
- Turn Start: At 200+ value, gain (value - 200)/50 Offense Level Up & Defense Level Up.
- Turn Start: At less than 200 value, gain (200 - value)/50 Offense Level Down & Defense Level Down.

OwnTime.name: Shared Time
OwnTime.desc:
- Turn Start: At 40+ value, gain (value - 40)/10 Offense Level Up & Defense Level Up.
- Turn Start: At less than 40 value, gain (40 - value)/10 Offense Level Down & Defense Level Down.

EquitableDistribution.name: Joint Time Expenditure
EquitableDistribution.desc: When spending Shared Time, the Brains spend an equal amount of time across the board.

UnfairDistribution.name: Infighting
UnfairDistribution.desc:
When spending Shared Time, the Brains no longer spend an equal amount of time across the board.
Turn Start: all parts lose Protection equal to the number of Parts with different remaining Time values.

VibrationContinue.name: Tremor - Everlasting
VibrationContinue.desc:
- When hit by Skills or Coin effects that trigger Tremor Burst, (Tremor Potency on self)% chance to trigger an additional Tremor Burst. (max 50%)
- When hit by Skills or Coin effects that trigger Tremor Burst, (Tremor Count on self)% chance to trigger an additional Tremor Burst. (max 50%)
- When hit by Skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect's Potency
- Turn End: reduce the Count by 1
(Interacts the same way as normal Tremor does to effects that raise or reduce Tremor Potency/Count)

TimeKillerWatch.name: Time Rescue Target
TimeKillerWatch.desc: Targeted by the Time Ripper while Time Acceleration is active.

TimeSuspend.name: Time Moratorium
TimeSuspend.desc:
- Does not take any damage as long as this effect is active; store all damage received instead
- Combat End: If there is only 1 Count left of this effect, the effect triggers Tremor Burst after dealing (100 + (Stack x 15)% of stored damage as Sloth damage
- Turn End: gain 1 Stack and lose 1 Count
- The Time Moratorium will immediately expire after triggering the Tremor Burst and the Sloth damage effect if another instance of Time Moratorium is inflicted on a unit with Time Moratorium.

VibrationChainPersonality.name: Tremor - Chain
VibrationChainPersonality.desc:
- Lose 1 Clash Power for every 10 Tremor Potency on self (max 3)
- When Hit by Skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect's Potency
- Turn End: reduce the Count by 1
- (Interacts the same way as normal Tremor does to effects that raise or reduce Tremor Potency/Count)

TimeRentalTwoPersonality.name: Borrowed Time
TimeRentalTwoPersonality.desc:
Turn End at 2+ Count:
- Gain (Borrowed Time Count - 1) Haste, Clash Power Up, and Fragile next turn
- If this unit is set to gain more Bind than Haste next turn, the Borrowed Time effect expires at the next Turn Start, and this unit gets Staggered

Turn End: At 1 Count, gain 2(Borrowed Time Stack - 1) Bind next turn
Turn End: Gain 1 Stack, lose 1 Count

ColdBlackTear.name: Cold, Black Tears
ColdBlackTear.desc:
- Max Stack: 5
- Turn Start: gain 1 Clash Power Down
- If this unit is hit while it has this effect, lose (Stack x 2) SP (once per turn; does not activate when hit by a Cracked Coin)
- If Queen of Hatred reduced this effect, heal 5 SP
- This effect cannot reduce this unit's SP below -40

HelplessTear.name: Helpless Tears
HelplessTear.desc:
- Max Stack: 1
- Gain 3 Offense Levels
- Lose 6 Defense Levels
- All Skills gain +1 Atk Weight
- All Skills become Unbreakable Coins
- Inflict +1 more Sinking Potency and Count

WornOutKnight.name: Weathered Knight
WornOutKnight.desc:
Take +100% damage for this turn

The knight who wanted to redeem herself by saving others was now dishonorably called the Knight of Despair; forgotten from the people's memory, just like the others.

SignOfDespair.name: Blessing of Despair
SignOfDespair.desc:
After Attack: if there are targets without Cold, Black Tears, removes this effect next turn

Gain 1 Clash Power Up and 1 Damage Up
Inflict +1 more Cold, Black Tears

CollapsedPride.name: Crumbled Pride
CollapsedPride.desc: All that remains is the hollow pride of a weathered knight.

FailedToAssistQueen.name: What use... am I...?
FailedToAssistQueen.desc:
- Max Stack: 1
- Lose 3 Offense Levels
- Lose 3 Defense Levels

UsedTooMuchPower.name: I used too much power
UsedTooMuchPower.desc:
- Max Stack: 1
- Turn End: escapes from the Encounter

Exhausted and unable to move.

ChasingArcana.name: Chanting - Arcana Slave
ChasingArcana.desc:
- Max Stack: 3
- Gain 1 at Turn Start
- At 3 Stack, gains 20 Speed and uses ARCANA SLAVE next turn

ChasingArcanahard.name: Chanting - Arcana Slave
ChasingArcanahard.desc:
- Max Stack: 3
- Gain 1 at Turn Start
- At 3 Stack: next turn, gain 20 Bind and use ARCANA SLAVE

PowerOfLoveAndJustice.name: Love/Justice
PowerOfLoveAndJustice.desc: - For every Stack, inflict +1 more Rupture Potency

CentralCommandTeamCaptain.name: Central Command Team Captain
CentralCommandTeamCaptain.desc:
- Skill Slot +1
- Modify Skill pool: Gain 1 use of Skill 3, but lose 1 use of Skill 1
- Increase the amount of Burn, Bleed, Rupture, Sinking, or Tremor Potency inflicted with Skills by +1 (including 'Unique Status Effects')
- Increase the amount of Poise Potency or Charge Count(including 'Unique Charge') gained from Skills by +1
- Instead of Panicking or Corroding, reset SP to 0 next turn (once per Encounter)
- Base Attack Skills with 2+ Atk Weight deal +30% damage
- On Kill, Gain +2 E.G.O resource to the Affinity of the Skill that defeated the enemy; gain +1 E.G.O resource to rest of the Affinities

BestWelfareTeamMember.name: Welfare Team Model Employee
BestWelfareTeamMember.desc:
- When inflicting Burn, Bleed, Rupture, Sinking, and Tremor Potency with this unit's Skills, inflict +1 more of each (including 'Unique Status Effects')
- Instead of Panicking or Corroding, reset this unit's SP to 0 next turn (once per Encounter)
- If this effect is applied to Lobotomy E.G.O::The Sword Sharpened with Tears Rodion, gain 1 Pierce DMG Up at every Turn Start

KnightBless.name: Blessing
KnightBless.desc:
- Turn Start: gain 2 Protection
- Adjust any Attack Type Resistances exceeding 1 to 1 (unless Staggered)

TraumaShield.name: Trauma Shield
TraumaShield.desc:
- Reduce SP damage from enemies by 80%
- Reduce Sinking damage taken by 80%
- Reduced by 1 at Turn End

Choice_901001.name: Spreading Flame
Choice_901001.desc: Combat Start: Allies without Wrath Affinity Attack Skill take 5 Wrath damage

Choice_901007.name: Gentle Sendoff
Choice_901007.desc: Turn Start: Heal 10 HP and SP. (Up to 3 turns)

Choice_901010.name: Emptied

Choice_90104001.name: Understanding

Choice_9010400101.name: Determined

Choice_90104002.name: Longing

MDcFcBb.name: Siphon Damage
MDcFcBb.desc: On Hit, heal 5% of damage dealt as HP

MDcFcBd.name: Sanity Attack
MDcFcBd.desc: On Hit, deal 2 fixed SP damage

MDcFcBe.name: Keenness

MDcFcBf.name: Regroup
MDcFcBf.desc: Turn Start: Gain 3 Offense Level Up if this unit did not take HP damage last turn

MDHcFcBb.name: Final Power Up II
MDHcFcBb.desc: Final Power +2, Defense Level -4, Max HP +15%

MDHcFcBd.name: Base Power Up II
MDHcFcBd.desc: Base Power +2, Defense Level -4, Max HP +10%

MDHcFcBe.name: Coin Power Up I
MDHcFcBe.desc: Plus Coin Power +1, Minus Coin Power -1

MDHcFdBa.name: Final Power Up III
MDHcFdBa.desc: Final Power +2, Defense Level +6, Max HP +10%

MDHcFdBc.name: Coin Power Up II
MDHcFdBc.desc: Plus Coin Power +1, Minus Coin Power -1, Max HP +15%

MDHcFdBd.name: Base Power Up III
MDHcFdBd.desc: Base Power +2, Defense Level +3, Max HP +10%

WaveSinking.name: Reflux
WaveSinking.desc:
- Max Stack: 3
When hit, gain Sinking Potency equal to Stack

Turn End: if this unit has -30 or less SP, activate the following effects (for units without SP, activates at 60+ Sinking Potency)
- Take (Sinking Potency on self x Stack) Gloom damage
- Inflict 1 Reflux against 2 other targets with the least SP (for Abnormalities, Parts); then, deal (Sinking Potency x Stack) Gloom damage to both targets, respectively
If the unit with Reflux dies, transfer its Reflux Stack to its ally with the highest Reflux stack

EmergencyChargeForceField.name: Emergency Barrier Battery
EmergencyChargeForceField.desc:
- Max Stack: 7
- When Staggered, consume all Emergency Barrier Battery Stack and gain Charge Barrier by the Stack consumed

Curse.name: Curse
Curse.desc:
Turn End: Next turn, randomly gain one of the following, then reduce this effect’s Count by 1.
1 Attack Power Down/1 Defense Power Down/2 Offense Level Down/2 Defense Level Down.

EmittedCurrent.name: Spark Discharge
EmittedCurrent.desc: When hit, the attacker gains +1 Charge Count; when hit with a Gloom attack, gain +1 Rupture Count, then reduce Count by 1

CollapseAmpoule.name: Decay Ampule
CollapseAmpoule.desc: Take damage by 2% of Max HP per Count

RedApricotBlossom.name: Red Plum Blossom
RedApricotBlossom.desc:
- Unique Bleed
- Max value: 10
- +10% chance for this unit to be Critically Hit if this unit is the main target
- When struck by a Critical Hit, gain Bleed equal to the half of the value and take +(value x 3)% damage on Critical Hit
- Reduce value by 1 when hit

Combustion.name: Burn
Combustion.desc:
At the end of the turn, take fixed damage by the effect’s Potency.
Then, reduce its Count by 1.

Laceration.name: Bleed
Laceration.desc:
When tossing an attack Coin, take fixed damage by the effect’s Potency.
Then, reduce its Count by 1.

Vibration.name: Tremor
Vibration.desc:
When attacked by skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect’s Potency.
At the end of the turn, reduce the Count by 1.

Burst.name: Rupture
Burst.desc:
When hit by an attack, take fixed damage by the effect’s Potency.
Then, reduce its Count by 1.

Sinking.name: Sinking
Sinking.desc:
When hit by an attack, take fixed SP damage by the effect’s Potency.
(Units with no Sanity take Gloom damage instead.)
Then, reduce its Count by 1.

VibrationCollapse.name: Tremor - Decay
VibrationCollapse.desc:
Lose 1 Defense Level for every 4 Tremor Potency on self
When Hit by Skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect's Potency
Turn End: reduce the Count by 1
(Interacts the same way as normal Tremor does to effects that raises or reduces Tremor Potency/Count)

VibrationCrack.name: Tremor - Fracture
VibrationCrack.desc:
- When Staggered, and when the sum of Tremor Potency and Count adds up to 20 or higher, raise Stagger Level by 1
- Cannot exceed maximum Stagger Level with this effect

When hit by attacks that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect's Potency
Turn End: reduce the Count by 1
(Interacts the same way as normal Tremor does to effects that raises or reduces Tremor Potency/Count)

VibrationEcho.name: Tremor - Reverb
VibrationEcho.desc:
- On Tremor Burst, take Sloth damage equal to Tremor Potency on self.
- When hit by Skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect's Potency.
- Turn End: reduce the Count by 1.
(Interacts the same way as normal Tremor does to effects that raise or reduce Tremor Potency/Count)

VibrationNesting.name: Tremor - Superposition
VibrationNesting.desc:
- Gained through Amplitude Entanglement
- When triggering Amplitude Conversion, add the effects of the resulting Tremor type to the list of active Tremor effects under Tremor - Superposition.

Reduction.name: Attack Power Down
Reduction.desc: Attack skills lose final Power by the effect’s Count for one turn.

Disarming.name: Defense Power Down
Disarming.desc: Defense skills lose final Power by the effect’s Count for one turn.

ResultReduction.name: Power Down
ResultReduction.desc: All skills lose final Power by the effect’s Count for one turn.

Vulnerable.name: Fragile
Vulnerable.desc: Take more damage from skills based on the effect’s Count for one turn. (Max 10)

AttackDmgDown.name: Damage Down
AttackDmgDown.desc: Deal less damage with skills based on the effect’s Count for one turn. (Max 10)

Binding.name: Bind
